Rate Routines and Parameter Sets

Lesson
objectives

Access rate routines in the PolicyCenter user
interface

Identify the parts of a rate routine

Access parameter sets in the PolicyCenter
user interface

Identify the parts of a parameter set

| Rate routines i

Rating Analyst What is a rate routine and what is it
used for in PolicyCenter?

A rate routine defines steps (ene a
for calculating a cost for purailise)
coverage, taxes, and other 37
costs on a policy. I'll show
you more about rate |

routines.

| Rating user story : Rate routines fa

.

Quote m>> -

Rating Engine

[ G d Rate routines

Set up Rate Routines As an actuary or rating analyst,!_ The Rate Routines in
want to enter the rate routines PolicyCenter represent the rating
into the Rating Engine. (algorithm) used to calculate each

premium or cost

| Rate routine structure i

¢ Arate routine has one or more
instruction that makes up the rating
algorithm

* Each instruction is made up of one or
more steps

¢ The rate routine steps may include
mathematical operators, conditionals
and assignments that work on the
rate table lookups

| Demonstration G

Rate routines

click here

Note: The demonstration opens a new tab in your browser. When the demonstration ends, the
original course launch window appears. Return to this window to continue this presentation.

Question

_- — Whatis the purpose of a rate routine?
¢
4
¢

SS oe Oooo ee Oooo ooOoD

Answer

_- — Whatis the purpose of a rate routine?

¢
oe The rate routine provides a way to define the rating algorithm for the rating engine.

SS oe ooo ee oe oOoOe SoD

| About parameter sets i

Julia
Implementation {
Architect

Next, let’s talk about
.
Y y parameter sets.

Kalani °
Rating Analyst Ve

Yes, | see that parameter
sets are connected to
rate routines. Please tell
me more about these.

| Parameter sets and the rate routine

¢« Aparameter set enables users to
define the information available for use
within a rate routine.
* Each rate routine uses a parameter set

* Parameter sets determine the contextual
information that is passed to a rate routine
at run-time

* Parameter sets can be defined for a policy
line or remain generic

¢ Parameter sets are pre-defined

| Demonstration G

Parameter sets

click here

Note: The demonstration opens a new tab in your browser. When the demonstration ends, the
original course launch window appears. Return to this window to continue this presentation.

Question

,- — Howmany parameter sets are associated with a rate routine?

¢
4
¢

SS oe Oooo ee Oooo ooOoD

Answer

,- — Howmany parameter sets are associated with a rate routine?

yy One.

SS oe ooo ee oe oOoOe SoD
